text: Seventeen Moments of Spring () is a 1973 Soviet movie directed by Tatyana Lioznova.110 лет назад в Речице родился народный артист СССР Ефим КопелянСЕМНАДЦАТЬ МГНОВЕНИЙ ВЕСНЫ (1973) It stars Vyacheslav Tikhonov, Yevgeniy Yevstigneyev, and Lev Durov. ==Actors== *Vyacheslav Tikhonov — Max Otto von Stierlitz *Yevgeniy Yevstigneyev — Professor Pleischner *Lev Durov — Klaus *Svetlana Svetlichnaya — Gabi Nabel *Nikolai Volkov — Erwin Kinn *Yekaterina Gradova — Katherin Kinn *Oleg Tabakov — Walter Schellenberg *Leonid Bronevoy — Heinrich Müller *Mikhail Zharkovsky — Ernst Kaltenbrunner *Emilia Milton — Mrs Saurich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1973 movies
title: Seventeen Moments of Spring
